website_summaries.verdict: Despite a couple of design issues, this mat offers good quality – and a memory game – for 2-4-year-olds.
pros: Comes with five pre-programmed songs, as well as a built-in memory game
cons: Material makes a noise when you step on it that takes away from the clarity of the piano sound

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandson when I am babysitting. He is 1 year old. He doesn't play with it for long periods of time, but when he does play with it, he laughs and enjoys it. Of course, I have to play with him.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie May

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old niece loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old niece who LOVES IT. If you want peace and quiet, this is not for you as it is a musical toy, but great as a gift for someone else's baby!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne!

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality and materials are really great. She has been using it for about two ...
customer_reviews.text: My Niece is 2 and a half and absolutely loves this! The sound quality and materials are really great. She has been using it for about two months and it still looks new
customer_reviews.author: Laura J.

customer_reviews.title: I’m was so excited for my son to eat this ...
customer_reviews.text: It is really quite ... Usually I’m happy with that, because some toys can be pretty obnoxious! But, being made from a material that makes a swooshing- crackling noise when it’s stepped on ... you can barely hear the notes of the piano over the materials noises. I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan VanZandt

customer_reviews.title: lol!
customer_reviews.text: Omg to even get this started it goes on for like 5 minutes telling your kid how to use it.... I dont even have that long of an attention spand
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Piano setting and Mickey Mouse sound effects settings are awesome and he enjoys it
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves it. Piano setting and Mickey Mouse sound effects settings are awesome and he enjoys it. The memory setting on the other hand is way to challenging..so we don’t use that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the only thing i don't really like about it is the demo switch on the back
customer_reviews.text: my niece loves this! she dances to the music mode, and jumps up and down (practically abuses it, lol) on the keys. the only thing i don't really like about it is the demo switch on the back. i don't think it has a use and she's always switching it to demo mode and i have to switch it back to the play mode for it to continue playing. otherwise, great toy.
customer_reviews.author: jnxt

customer_reviews.title: A good gift for the little one
customer_reviews.text: A good gift for the little one. It keeps my nephew busy with the music. But it comes with a testing battery so I need to buy the battery separately otherwise I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sakil

customer_reviews.title: Epic Fail!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter was not interested in this at all, hate it when I waste my money😔
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great.
customer_reviews.text: 2 yr old Grandaughter loves it. parents are even having fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: NancyS

customer_reviews.title: It is cute and exactly like it appears in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: It is cute and exactly like it appears in the pictures, but unfortunately my toddler doesn't like it much, and it doesn't keep his interest for more than a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra robinson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: 2 year old daughter likes to dance and play music on this

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My nephew liked this gift but it wasn't quite as well made as wxpected

customer_reviews.title: And when your toddler is more into the on/off button it gets very annoying quickly.
customer_reviews.text: The intro is so long!! And when your toddler is more into the on/off button it gets very annoying quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toy! 1 year old doesn’t play with it ...

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as I thought
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't as big as I thought it would be, but that's my own fault. My son liked it for a day or so and put it away.

customer_reviews.title: great toy

customer_reviews.title: great packaging and a great product
customer_reviews.text: My little boy loves it! Fast shipping, great packaging and a great product.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Was a good price, arrived fast with no damage, and works well. The only reason for the four rating is it could respond better to touch.

customer_reviews.title: It didn't look like there would be damage to the item inside
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift; but, there was damage to the box. I gave it away to someone else instead. It didn't look like there would be damage to the item inside, though.
customer_reviews.author: H S

customer_reviews.title: He's 1 and it's a great fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this ! He's 1 and it's a great fun toy ! Would recommend to all my mom friends

product_meta.title: Mickey Mouse Club House Piano Music Mat
product_meta.description: Are you ready to make some music? With 3 different ways to play and some mouskariffic tunes, this'll be lots of fun! All ya gotta do is press any of the spots on top to get started! If ya wanna play the piano, just press the piano spot. Or you can press the music spot to hear some great dancing' music! If you wanna play the Meeska Mooska Memory Game, press the memory button! C'mon let's get started.
feature_bullets: Includes follow me memory game and interactive electronic piano that plays 5 pre-programmed tunes and musical riff
Child hears Mickey Mouse give directions on game play
Fun and exciting electronic interactive music mat

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars58 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
